item.title: Icarus and the Sun
item.description: Week 3: Red Circle. This art was lovingly created using: unknown medium. Artist’s Notes Pretty late to the party but here we go. a reimagination of the classical story. I try to make use of circular composition to portray the relationship between the two figures. Social Media Twitch: soggyricecracker Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer. Parsed source from Discord is as follows: Pretty late to the party but here we go.
